Subject: Endpoint Protector Client Errors Out Unexpectedly
Description:
We are in the process of testing and implementing Endpoint Protector in our macOS environment. Following a successful deployment of Endpoint Protector via Jamf on a few test macOS devices, we observed that the application crashes unexpectedly. However, despite these crashes, it continues to function as expected. We are seeking your assistance to troubleshoot and identify the cause of these crashes in our macOS devices.

Details of our macOS environment:
MDM: Jamf Pro
OS Version: Sonoma 14.7.1 (23H222)
Chipset: M1 and M2
Endpoint Protector Version: 3.0.4.1006
What_We_Know__c:
EPP version 5.9.4.1

- Agent Crashes unexpectedly on MacOS devices intermittently
- Issue has not happened today
- Requested the customer to take a screenshot and log files to be extracted 

Requested customer to run following if experiences issue again:

cp /private/var/log/eppclient.log ~/Desktop
cp /private/var/log/eppclient_append.log ~/Desktop
cp /etc/epp/reprovision.db ~/Desktop
cp /etc/epp/rights.s3db ~/Desktop
cp /etc/epp/netdlp/netdlp_settings.json ~/Desktop
Next_Steps__c: Awaiting customer sending logs and screenshots once issue occurs
Solution_Comment__c:
- Agent Crashes unexpectedly on MacOS devices intermittently
- Issue has not happened today
- Requested the customer to take a screenshot and log files to be extracted

Requested customer to run following if experiences issue again:

cp /private/var/log/eppclient.log ~/Desktop
cp /private/var/log/eppclient_append.log ~/Desktop
cp /etc/epp/reprovision.db ~/Desktop
cp /etc/epp/rights.s3db ~/Desktop
cp /etc/epp/netdlp/netdlp_settings.json ~/Desktop

Issue has not reoccurred and customer has requested to close ticket and will reopen if experences issue again
